name: Halls (SpazDev)
description:
Controls:

[W] [A] [S] [D] = move

mouse = look

[E] = search drawers / hide in closet / open door

[SPACE] = use item

Halls Is a game inspired by doors, the backrooms, and ways. it is made in scratch, it is also a game about traversing through haunted halls of an old asylum being torn down soon and avoiding the monsters within

all rights belong to LSPLASH, 

credits to https://scratch.mit.edu/users/AnNguyenSplayer/ for most images used and some sounds.

Lore:

You're a supernatural occurence documenter who recieves a report about an asylum, you go there with your camera, but it dies, and you forgot your batteries in the van, but its been pretty normal so far... you look for an exit to get to your van, that's when things started getting strange
